snippet.title: Kitty Pig for Playdate - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Take control of Pig and bounce Kitty high in the sky to collect bugs, in Kitty Pig, the Playdate’s newest quick-play, action game!   

Keep Kitty in the air as long as you can and go for the hi-score, but be warned, with each new level Kitty bounces faster and faster as tricky beetles join the fray!  

With a level progression reminiscent of Tetris, every play is different with randomly generated levels and wild Pig Powerups!   

It’s an addictive game of cat and PIG!
